## Warmup Complete - Codebase Overview

This is **Daniel Fotescu's Portfolio** - a modern Next.js 15 application with a terminal-inspired design aesthetic.

### Technology Stack
- **Framework**: Next.js 15.1.0 with App Router
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS v4 (alpha) with CSS variables
- **Animation**: Framer Motion
- **Fonts**: Geist Sans & Geist Mono
- **Testing**: Playwright for E2E tests

### Architecture Highlights

**Core Philosophy**: "Terminal-inspired design meets modern UX"

**Directory Structure**:
```
src/
├── app/           # Next.js App Router pages
│   ├── layout.tsx # Root layout with metadata, fonts, analytics
│   ├── page.tsx   # Homepage with interactive CLI interface
│   └── api/       # API routes
├── components/    # React components
│   ├── cli/       # Terminal/CLI components
│   ├── sections/  # Page sections (Hero, Projects, etc.)
│   └── ui/        # Reusable UI components
├── lib/           # Utilities and business logic
└── types/         # TypeScript type definitions
```

**Key Features**:
1. Interactive CLI interface (terminal emulator in browser)
2. Command-K search modal
3. Project showcases with case studies
4. Contact integration with Formspree
5. SEO optimization with JSON-LD structured data

**Design System**: Uses CSS custom properties in HSL format with semantic naming (e.g., `--background`, `--foreground`, `--accent`)

### Critical Files for Implementation
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/app/layout.tsx` - Root layout with global configuration
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/app/page.tsx` - Homepage component structure
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/src/components/cli/` - CLI interface components
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/docs/ARCHITECTURE.md` - System design documentation
- `/Users/dfotesco/Portfolio/portfolio/tailwind.config.ts` - Design system configuration
